sectionNotes: Restricted to Biochemistry or Molecular and Cellular Biology major(s). Restricted to students with Junior or Senior class standing.
sectionText: Students must register for both the lecture and one lab.  Lecture will meet beginning on Friday, January 20, 2017.  Labs will meet beginning on Wednesday, January 18, 2017. This class will be restricted to seniors until Nov. 9 and then to juniors until Nov.14.  Restrictions will be removed on Nov. 14.
